---
title: "Collegiate Sports Budgets"
author: "Denali Stevens"
format: html
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
tuesdata <- tidytuesdayR::tt_load('2022-03-29')
tuesdata <- tidytuesdayR::tt_load(2022, week = 13)
sports <- tuesdata$sports

# start by looking at University of Oregon 
Oregon <- sports |> filter(institution_name == "University of Oregon")
# narrow down the variables
# Keep year, all ef values, all Participation values, all revenu, all expenditures, and name of sport 
Oregon_filtered <- Oregon |> select(year, starts_with("ef"), contains("partic"), contains("rev"), contains("exp"), sports)
view(Oregon_filtered)
```
